attributes.action: all taxi drivers should be CRB checked to safeguard vulnerable customers.
attributes.additional_details:
Following a number of rapes and assaults along with the paedophile connections to taxi drivers around the country eg Heywood /Rochdale last year. I believe that all taxi drivers should have to undergo a full CRB check. Which would hopefully eliminate the above risk and also weed out illegally working immigrants.
Please sign and safeguard  vulnerable people  of all ages. Thank you for viewing  and hopefully signing this petition and hopefully make a difference.
